title: Best of The Herd for Mar 18, 2020

description:
Buccaneers are truly a Quarterback away from competing and now they have one

Tom Brady will win this divorce short term

This is Brady's mid-life crisis

Stop defending Cam Newton, his own team doesn't like him

Tom Brady never got over Belichick wanting Jimmy Garoppolo instead of him
